products.title: Shoreditch Saffron Curtain
products.metadescription: Shoreditch Saffron Curtain in Grey/Yellow/Red/Multicoloured. Made to measure from £24.42 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Curtain includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Shoreditch range is a bold print that is available in a variety of equally bold colours. 
 
These curtains are made up of tones of yellow and grey that combine to create a true statment piece that will look great in any room in your home.

products.title: Aztec Salsa Red Curtain
products.metadescription: Aztec Salsa Red Curtain in Red. Made to measure from £29.04 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Curtain includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Inspired by indigenous tribal patterns from the South Americas, this 100% Cotton Aztec Salsa Red Curtain uses a rustic warm red shade on a neutral background to create these stunning curtains. This fabric will provide a warm pop of colour when paired with rich dark woods within the home & will look equally as beautiful with neutral tones.  All our curtains are lovingly handmade within the UK. 
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, quality is important to us, which is why this curtain comes with our FREE five year guarantee and customer-first service. Available as a matching roman!
 
 Product ID: DB-CUR1224 Fabric Colour: Salsa Red Material: 100% Cotton Lining: Light Filtering Poly/Cotton Blended Lining     Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes

products.productdescription:
Art decadence is executed through a deep red 100% cotton-blend fabric. The Art Deco Garnet Red Curtain is sweeping with the fan design recognised from the late 1920s. Pair with a natural themed room and add red accessories to make this curtain a feature and talking point. 
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, quality is important to us, which is why this curtain comes with our FREE five-year guarantee and customer-first service. Available as a matching roman!

products.productdescription:
Inspired by traditional Scandinavian folk art, Scandi Bloom is a lush pattern, consisting of bold, clean lines and coordinating colours. 
 
Add a splash of passion into your home with this Poppy Red curtain, with green lush leaves with a contemporary red twist, this blind will look at home in your window.  Accessorise with natural materials for the ultimate Scandi-look. 
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, quality is important to us, which is why your new curtain comes with a fabulous five year guarantee, for extra peace of mind

products.title: 70s Poppy Red Curtain
products.metadescription: 70s Poppy Red Curtain in Red. Made to measure from £29.04 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Curtain includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Add this bold print to your home, in this callback to the 1970s. A simple, yet effective poppy repeat pattern, this fabric is as stylish as it is eye-catching. 
 This poppy red curtain, is a fantastic insulator, and can be layered with roman blinds to create a luxurious final look. 
 At Swift Direct Blinds, quality is important to us, which is why your new curtain comes with a fabulous five year guarantee, for extra peace of mind.

products.title: Angle Embroidered Marshmallow Curtain
products.metadescription: Angle Embroidered Marshmallow Curtain in Cream/Red/Pink/Multicoloured. Made to measure from £34.32 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Curtain includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Create movement through your home with our Angle Embroidered Marshmallow Curtain inspired by Bauhaus school of design this interlocking geometric design is carefully embroidered with threads of blush pink, teal blue with strokes of burnt orange and red. The Linen blend base will ensure your blind sits beautifully in the room of your choice. From the Prestigious Abstract Collection this fabric was designed to celebrate 100 years of influential hallmarks. 
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, quality is important to us, which is why this curtain comes with our FREE five-year guarantee and customer-first service. Available as a matching roman! 
 
 
 
 Product ID: DB-CUR1219 Fabric Colour: Marshmallow Material: 42% Viscose 40% Cotton 18% Linen Lining: Light Filtering Poly/Cotton Blended Lining     Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes

products.productdescription:
The Menara Embroidered Olive-Green Roman blind will be sure to add a sense of style to your home, perfect for any living space the delicately embroidered green trees add instant texture and depth. Hand selected from the Clarke & Clarke Prince of Persia Collection, we never compromise on quality and this fabric is sure to compliment your window for years to come. 
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, quality is important to us, which is why this curtain comes with our FREE five-year guarantee and customer-first service. Available as a matching roman!
